授業目的: The purpose is for students to increase and hone their English ability and apply these skills effectively.
到達目標:
The aims of the class are so that students will be able to-
1 Develop speaking, reading and listening skills.
2 Do oral reading practice for better understanding of key sentences.
3 Apply strategies for listening and reading sections.
4 To work on exercises in the text book.
5 Review mistakes and to understand grammar points with instructors help.
授業の概要・背景:
In a typical lesson students will be asked to brain storm ideas and knowledge about selected topics.
Students will listen to a reading text and complete a cloze exercise to test their comprehension.
Grammar exercises follow.
Students will be expected to do assignments prior to the class and spend at least 60 minutes after the class consolidating knowledge.
